sentences.en: Asteroids, also known as " minor planets ", are numerous in the outer space.
sentences.cn: 小行星, 亦称为 “ 小型行星 ”, 在外太空中不计其数.

sentences.en: At six p.m. large groups poured from the numerous offices.
sentences.cn: 下午6点钟大群大群的人从无数办公楼里蜂拥而出。

sentences.en: He has been late on numerous occasions.
sentences.cn: 他已经迟到过无数次了。

sentences.en: He has watched a video replay of his fall on numerous occasions.
sentences.cn: 他多次看自己跌倒时的重放录像.

sentences.en: He was asked to sit on numerous committees.
sentences.cn: 他受邀担任过许多委员会的委员。

sentences.en: He was surrounded by his numerous progeny.
Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.cn: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.en: Numerous attempts to persuade him to write his memoirs came to nought.
sentences.cn: 无数次劝他写回忆录的尝试均以失败告终。

sentences.en: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
sentences.cn: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

sentences.en: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital.
sentences.cn: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

sentences.en: The fiery player has had numerous run-ins with referees.
sentences.cn: 这位脾气暴躁的队员曾和裁判员发生过无数次争吵。

sentences.en: The globular seed capsule contains numerous small seeds.
sentences.cn: 这种球形种子荚里含有大量的小种子。

sentences.en: The pitfalls of working abroad are numerous.
sentences.cn: 到国外工作存在许多陷阱。

sentences.en: The related publications are far too numerous to list individually.
sentences.cn: 相关出版物太多,没法一一列举.

sentences.en: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.cn: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

sentences.en: This year numerous bands are playing, as well as comedy acts.
sentences.cn: 今年除了那些搞笑短剧外，还会有众多乐队登台献艺。

sentences.en: Wild boar are numerous in the valleys.
sentences.cn: 山谷里有无数野猪出没。

trans.tran_cn: 很多的，许多的，数量庞大的，数不清的
